definition: to touch or push gently, to seek the attention of by a push of the elbow
examples: … nudged the cue ball with the tip of the cue.
… nudged Ron in the ribs and pointed at Malfoy …

definition: to prod lightly : urge into action
examples: … have been nudged into starting their own ventures …
its circulation is nudging the four million mark
She nudged and jostled through the crowd.
